title: Longer shifts do not create chronic sleep loss in first-year doctors or reduce safety for patients, study finds

title_detail.value: Longer shifts do not create chronic sleep loss in first-year doctors or reduce safety for patients, study finds

summary: Two large national studies show that patient safety was unaffected and residents showed no signs of chronic sleep loss regardless of shift length.

summary_detail.value: Two large national studies show that patient safety was unaffected and residents showed no signs of chronic sleep loss regardless of shift length.
